Reviews.Title: piece of junk
Reviews.Author: moses eason
Reviews.Content: I cant even put headphones into the jack the whole thing is not even lined up right, the sound is awful and you can not see the picture very well its to dark in thats the lightest it goes, what a waste of money

Reviews.Title: not 3g
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: I bought this because it said 3g in the title.  It's not however 3g, it's "3g dongle capable", I've tried 2 different dongles to no avail.  As long as your not looking a 3g tablet, this will do.

Reviews.Title: POS...Don't buy!
Reviews.Author: Robert Leonard
Reviews.Content: Delivery took forever then when it finally arrived the screen didn't even work right. The screen is not very bright and you can not use it in a brightly lit room or outside. I tried explaining tbe problem with the screen to the seller but they are not very knowledgeable about their products and were no help. They offered for me to ship it back so they could look at it but they wanted me to pay for shipping on the broke item they sent me. I can barely use the dam thing since a portion of the screen doesn't respond to touch and is completely useless. I WOULD NOT recommend this product to anyone. I would save a little more $$$ and buy a decent tablet. A one star rating on this product is to high of a rating IMO.

Reviews.Title: cool product
Reviews.Author: melissa rowe
Reviews.Content: it awesome worth price had no problems. worth getting i check whole bunch before this one but doesn't come with hdmi cord
